    • send

      public <MSG> void send​(PacketDistributor.PacketTarget target, MSG message)
      Send a message to the PacketDistributor.PacketTarget from a PacketDistributor instance. 
           channel.send(PacketDistributor.PLAYER.with(()->player), message)
      Type Parameters:
      MSG - The type of the message
      Parameters:
      target - The curried target from a PacketDistributor
      message - The message to send

    • messageBuilder

      public <M> SimpleChannel.MessageBuilder<M> messageBuilder​(java.lang.Class<M> type, int id)
      Build a new MessageBuilder. The type should implement IntSupplier if it is a login packet.
      Type Parameters:
      M - Type of type
      Parameters:
      type - Type of message
      id - id in the indexed codec
      Returns:
      a MessageBuilder

    • messageBuilder

      public <M> SimpleChannel.MessageBuilder<M> messageBuilder​(java.lang.Class<M> type, int id, NetworkDirection direction)
      Build a new MessageBuilder. The type should implement IntSupplier if it is a login packet.
      Type Parameters:
      M - Type of type
      Parameters:
      type - Type of message
      id - id in the indexed codec
      direction - a network direction which will be asserted before any processing of this message occurs. Use to enforce strict sided handling to prevent spoofing.
      Returns:
      a MessageBuilder
